How to use

Some code examples:

{% raw %} 
from nbdev_deck_of_cards.core import *
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
deck = Deck()
deck.shuffle()
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
deck

<nbdev_deck_of_cards.core.Deck at 0x21d1c4f2e20>
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
print(deck)

len(deck)

52
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
hand = Hand()
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
deck.move_cards(hand, 5)
hand.sort()
print(hand)

9 of Clubs
Queen of Diamonds
4 of Hearts
3 of Spades
5 of Spades
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
len(deck)

{% endraw %}

Tests

{% raw %} 
c1 = Card(suit=2, rank=3)
assert str(c1) == '3 of Hearts'
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
c2 = Card(suit=1, rank=13)
assert(str(c2) == 'King of Diamonds')
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
c3 = Card(suit=1, rank=12)
assert(str(c3) == 'Queen of Diamonds')
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert c1 > c2
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert c3 < c2
{% endraw %}
